nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry

Class CyclicGeometry<TActual extends CyclicGeometry>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.BaseGeometry<TActual>
      • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.CyclicGeometry<TActual>
  • Type Parameters:
    TActual - the actual type of this geometry
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeometryConvertable<TActual>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, GeometryCycle, Polygon, Rectangle

    public abstract class CyclicGeometry<TActual extends CyclicGeometry>
extends BaseGeometry<TActual>
    Base class for a non-point geometry without a start and end point.

      CyclicGeometry()

      abstract double areaSigned()
      Computes the total signed area enclosed by the geometry.

      Computes the total area enclosed by the geometry.
      boolean contains(Vector point)
      Computes whether the provided point lies inside or on the boundary, with a precision of DoubleUtil.EPS.
      abstract boolean contains(Vector point, double prec)
      Computes whether the provided point lies inside or on the boundary, with a given precision.
      abstract double perimeter()
      Computes the total boundary length of the given geometry.
      abstract void reverse()
      Reverse this geometry from start to end, without changing its appearance.

    • Method Detail

      • perimeter

        public abstract double perimeter()
        Computes the total boundary length of the given geometry.
        Returns:
        perimeter length

      • areaUnsigned

        public double areaUnsigned()
        Computes the total area enclosed by the geometry. Should always be nonnegative.
        Returns:
        area

      • areaSigned

        public abstract double areaSigned()
        Computes the total signed area enclosed by the geometry. Should be positive for counterclockwise shapes and negative for clockwise shapes.
        Returns:
        signed area

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Vector point)
        Computes whether the provided point lies inside or on the boundary, with a precision of DoubleUtil.EPS.
        Parameters:
        point - location to check containment for
        Returns:
        whether the point lies inside or on the boundary

      • contains

        public abstract boolean contains(Vector point,
                                 double prec)
        Computes whether the provided point lies inside or on the boundary, with a given precision. A negative precision allows to check whether the point lies strictly inside, that is, not on the boundary.
        Parameters:
        point - location to check containment for
        prec - precision
        Returns:
        whether the point lies inside or on the boundary

      • reverse

        public abstract void reverse()
        Reverse this geometry from start to end, without changing its appearance.
